# ColorMeOutlines

[![curseforge](https://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/481530.svg?badge_style=for_the_badge)](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/color-me-outlines)
[![modrinth](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=5da426&label=Modrinth&query=downloads&url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.modrinth.com%2Fapi%2Fv1%2Fmod%2Fcolor-me-outlines&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&style=for-the-badge)](https://modrinth.com/mod/color-me-outlines)
[![discord](https://img.shields.io/discord/760524772189798431?label=wraith%20coding%20sesh&logo=discord&logoColor=white&color=5662f6&style=for-the-badge)](https://discord.gg/Zw4SP4MR9r)\
A Fabric mod for Minecraft that makes the block outline color configurable.
